sessions.title: Building Multi-Region Resilient Architectures with AWS
sessions.description: Design fault-tolerant architectures spanning multiple AWS regions. Learn cross-region replication patterns, Route 53 health checks, CloudFront for global distribution, and automated failover strategies for mission-critical applications.
speakers: Elena Popov, Principal Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Amazon ECS and Fargate: Serverless Container Orchestration
sessions.description: Deploy containerized applications without managing infrastructure. Explore ECS task definitions, Fargate launch types, auto-scaling policies, and integration with Application Load Balancer for production workloads.
speakers: Nathan Brooks, Container Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: AWS Direct Connect and Hybrid Cloud Networking
sessions.description: Build dedicated network connections between on-premises data centers and AWS. Learn LAG configuration, virtual interfaces, BGP routing, and bandwidth optimization for hybrid cloud architectures.

sessions.title: AWS Security Hub and Automated Compliance
sessions.description: Centralize security findings across AWS accounts with Security Hub. Implement automated compliance checks, integrate with AWS Config, GuardDuty, and Inspector for comprehensive security monitoring.
speakers: Marcus Williams, Security Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Amazon RDS Multi-AZ and Read Replicas at Scale
sessions.description: Design highly available relational database architectures with RDS. Learn Multi-AZ deployments, cross-region read replicas, automated backups, and performance tuning for MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Oracle workloads.
speakers: Sofia Martinez, Database Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: AWS PrivateLink: Secure VPC-to-VPC Connectivity
sessions.description: Enable private connectivity between VPCs without internet exposure. Learn VPC endpoint services, Network Load Balancer integration, cross-account access patterns, and security best practices.
speakers: Kevin Park, Senior Network Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Event-Driven Architectures with Amazon EventBridge
sessions.description: Build decoupled microservices using EventBridge. Explore event routing, schema registry, third-party SaaS integrations, and patterns for event sourcing and CQRS on AWS.

sessions.title: AWS Auto Scaling: Right-Sizing Your Compute Fleet
sessions.description: Optimize compute capacity with Auto Scaling Groups. Learn target tracking policies, predictive scaling, scheduled scaling, and lifecycle hooks for automated fleet management.
speakers: Brandon Lee, Compute Optimization Specialist, AWS

sessions.title: AWS WAF and Shield: DDoS Protection Strategies
sessions.description: Protect web applications from attacks with AWS WAF and Shield. Configure managed rules, rate-based rules, geo-blocking, and integration with CloudFront and Application Load Balancer.

sessions.title: Amazon ElastiCache: In-Memory Caching Patterns
sessions.description: Accelerate application performance with ElastiCache for Redis and Memcached. Learn cache-aside patterns, write-through strategies, cluster mode, and scaling techniques for high-throughput workloads.
speakers: Tony Nguyen, Caching Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Microservices Orchestration with AWS App Mesh
sessions.description: Manage microservices communication with App Mesh service mesh. Explore traffic routing, observability, circuit breakers, and integration with ECS, EKS, and EC2-based applications.

sessions.title: Amazon S3: Advanced Data Management Strategies
sessions.description: Master S3 for enterprise data lakes. Learn lifecycle policies, intelligent tiering, cross-region replication, S3 Batch Operations, and access control best practices for petabyte-scale storage.

sessions.title: AWS Global Accelerator: Optimizing Application Performance
sessions.description: Improve application availability and performance with Global Accelerator. Learn anycast IP addresses, traffic dials, endpoint weights, and integration with ALB and NLB for global traffic management.
speakers: Isabella Rodriguez, Network Performance Architect, AWS

sessions.title: AWS Elastic Beanstalk: Simplified Application Deployment
sessions.description: Deploy web applications with managed infrastructure using Elastic Beanstalk. Explore platform updates, environment configurations, blue/green deployments, and integration with RDS and ElastiCache.
speakers: Paul Anderson, Developer Tools Specialist, AWS
